flags.title: Netherlands
flags.flagDescription: A horizontal tricolor of red, white and blue.
colorSymbolism: The red band symbolizes bravery, strength, valor, and hardiness.
The white band symbolizes, peace and honesty.
The blue band represents vigilance, truth, loyalty, perseverance, and justice.

flags.title: Aa en Hunze
flags.flagDescription: Green, with an all-crossing yellow Andrew's cross, coming from the flag corners; on the hoist side a yellow three-petaled lily crown.
